api/index.html.title: Tizen UI Extensions
api/index.html.keywords: Tizen UI Extensions This document is the API Specification for Tizen UI Extensions. Namespace Description Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Provide the common classes that are commonly used on both UI frameworks. Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp Provide the advanced views and containers implemented with ElmSharp. Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI Provide the advanced views and containers implemented with NUI.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.Aspect.htm.title: Enum Aspect
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.Aspect.htm.keywords: Enum Aspect Defines how an image is displayed. Namespace : Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Assembly : Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI.dll Syntax public enum Aspect Fields Name Description AspectFill Scale the image to fill the view. Some parts may be clipped in order to fill the view. AspectFit Scale the image to fit the view. Some parts may be left empty (letter boxing). Fill Scale the image so it exactly fills the view. Scaling may not be uniform in X and Y.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.html.title: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.Common
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.html.keywords: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Classes BatchableExtensions DateChangedEventArgs DateChangedEventArgs event arguments. DeviceInfo FormattedString ItemSelectedEventArgs Holds information about selected item. LayoutEventArgs Holds information about size of the area which can be used for layout. Log Provides logging functionality. Span Represent a text with attributes applied. TextChangedEventArgs TextChangedEventArgs event arguments. Structs Color Log.Guardian A helper class, it allows to separate optional parameters from non-optional ones. In case of any compilation errors, please make sure you're not using explicit null value as one of the parameters. Point Struct defining a 2-D point as a pair of doubles. Rect Struct defining a rectangle, using doubles. Size Struct defining height and width as a pair of doubles. Interfaces IBatchable IContainable<T> Interface defining methods for managing elements of the container. ILogger IMeasurable Interface of the controls which can measure their size taking into account the available area. ITextable Interface defining properties of formattable text. Enums Aspect Defines how an image is displayed. DeviceOrientation DeviceType DisplayResolutionUnit DrawerHeaderBehavior Enumerates values that describe behaviors of the drawer in NavigationDrawer. FlyoutLayoutBehavior Enumerates values that describe behaviors of flyout. FontAttributes Enumerates values that describe attributes of text. Keyboard Keyboard layout type on entry control. LineBreakMode Enumerates values that describe options for line braking. PenLineCap PenLineJoin ReturnType Enumerates return button styles. ScrollBarVisibility Enumerates conditions under which scroll bars will be visible. ScrollOrientation Enumeration specifying vertical or horizontal scrolling directions. ScrollToPosition Enumerates values that describe a scroll request. Stretch TextAlignment Enumerates values that describe alignemnt of text. TextDecorations Flagging enumeration defining text decorations. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.LineBreakM.title: Enum LineBreakMode
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.Common.LineBreakM.keywords: Enum LineBreakMode Enumerates values that describe options for line braking. Namespace : Tizen.UIExtensions.Common Assembly : Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI.dll Syntax public enum LineBreakMode Fields Name Description CharacterWrap Wrap at character boundaries. HeadTruncation Truncate the head of text. MiddleTruncation Truncate the middle of text. This may be done, for example, by replacing it with an ellipsis. MixedWrap Tries to wrap at word boundaries, and then wrap at a character boundary if the word is too long. None Follow base LineBreakMode. NoWrap Do not wrap text. TailTruncation Truncate the tail of text. WordWrap Wrap at word boundaries.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.html.title: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.html.keywords: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp Classes ApplicationLayout ApplicationLayout.Parts ApplicationLayout.Styles Box Extends the ElmSharp.Box class with functionality useful to custom layout. Button Extends the ElmSharp.Button control, providing basic formatting features, i.e. font color, size, additional image. Canvas A Canvas provides a class which can be a container for other controls. CarouselPage The native box that provides CarouselPage features. CarouselView The CarouselView is a view for presenting data in a scrollable layout, where users can swipe to move through a collection of items. ClipperExtension CollectionView The CollectionView is a flexible and performant view for presenting lists of data using different layout specifications. ColorExtensions DateTimePicker DateTimePickerDialog Dialog Base class for Dialogs. A dialog is a small window that prompts the user to make a decision or enter additional information. DPExtensions DrawerBox The native widget which provides the Box with Drawer. EditfieldEntry EditFieldEntryLayout EditFieldEntryLayout.Parts EditFieldEntryLayout.Signals EditFieldEntryLayout.Styles EllipseView Entry Extends the Entry control, providing basic formatting features, i.e. font color, size, placeholder. EntryLayout EntryLayout.Parts EntryLayout.Styles FlyoutPage The native widget which provides Xamarin.FlyoutPage features. FormattedStringExtensions GeometryExtensions GradientBrush GradientStop GridLayoutManager A GridLayoutManager implementation which provides grid layout. Image Extends the ElmSharp.Image class with functionality useful to renderer. ImageExtensions IndicatorView The IndicatorView is a control that displays indicators that represent the number of items, and current position, in a CarouselView. IsPresentedChangedEventArgs ItemAdaptor Base class for an Adapter Adapters provide a binding from an app-specific data set to views that are displayed within a CollectionView. ItemsViewScrolledEventArgs Provides data for the CollectionView.Scrolled event. ItemsViewScrolledExtendedEventArgs Provides data for the extended CollectionView.Scrolled event. Label The Label class extends ElmSharp.Label to be better suited for Xamarin renderers. Mainly the formatted text support. LinearGradientBrush LinearLayoutManager A LinearLayoutManager implementation which provides linear layout. LineView NativeLayout NavigationDrawer The native widget to be used in Xamarin.Forms Shell. NavigationView The native widget that is configured with an header and an list of items to be used in NavigationDrawer. NavigationViewItem Page A basic page which can hold a single view. PageScrolledEventArgs Provides data for the CarouselPage.PageScrolled event. PathView PolygonView PolylineView RadialGradientBrush RectView ScrollView The ScrollView is a container that holds and clips a single object and allows you to scroll across it. SearchBar SearchBar SelectedItemChangedEventArgs Provides data for the CollectionView.ItemSelected event. SelectedPositionChangedEventArgs Provides data for the IndicatorView.SelectedPosition event. api/Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.SnapPoin.title: Enum SnapPointsType
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.SnapPoin.keywords: Enum SnapPointsType Enumerates values that specifies the behavior of snap points when scrolling.. Namespace : Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp Assembly : Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp.dll Syntax public enum SnapPointsType Fields Name Description Mandatory indicates that content always snaps to the closest snap point to where scrolling would naturally stop, along the direction of inertia. MandatorySingle indicates the same behavior as Mandatory, but only scrolls one item at a time. None indicates that scrolling does not snap to items.

api/Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI.html.title: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI
api/Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI.html.keywords: Namespace Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI Classes ActionSheetPopup A custom popup with list and returning a string value Button Extends the Tizen.NUI.Components.Button, providing Tizen.UIExtensions.Common data struct CollectionView A View that contain a templated list of items. CollectionViewScrolledEventArgs EventArgs for CollectionView Scrolled event CustomRenderingView Editor A control which provides a multi-line editable text editor. Entry A control which provides a single line editable text field. EntryExtensions FormattedStringExtensions GeometryExtensions GridLayoutManager A ICollectionViewLayoutManager implementation which provides grid layout Image View that holds an image. ImageExtensions ItemAdaptor Base class for an Adapter Adapters provide a binding from an app-specific data set to views that are displayed within a CollectionView. Label LabelExtensions LinearLayoutManager A ICollectionViewLayoutManager implementation which provides linear layout MessagePopup A custom popup with message and returning a bool value Popup A Popup provides a class which can be display topmost area Popup<T> Base class for custom popup PromptPopup A custom popup with entry and returning a string value ScrollView The ScrollView is a container that holds and clips a single object and allows you to scroll across it. ScrollViewExtensions SimpleViewStack SKCanvasView SKClipperView A container view that clipping children view SKGLSurfaceView SpanExtensions UnitExtensions ViewExtensions ViewGroup A ViewGroup provides a class which can be a container for other controls. ViewHolder Interfaces ICollectionViewController Interface to control CollectionView on internal modules these apis not open as CollectionView API ICollectionViewLayoutManager Interface for positioning item views within a CollectionView Enums CollectionViewSelectionMode Enumerates values that control whether items in a collection view can or cannot be selected. ItemSizingStrategy Enum for ItemSizingStrategy ViewHolderState

index.html.title: Tizen UI Extensions
index.html.keywords: Tizen UI Extensions Tizen.UIExtensions provides a set of advanced views and containers based on Tizen.NET UI Frameworks. It includes ElmSharp and NUI implementation sharing Common interfaces and structs. Common Tizen.UIExtensions.Common provides common features like structs and interfaces that are shared on both ElmSharp and NUI UI frameworks. ElmSharp Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp is a set of advanced views and containers based on ElmSharp . NUI Tizen.UIExtensions.NUI is a set of advanced views and containers based on NUI .
